name: Zooper Widget Template
summary: Learn about .ZW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When you save a template the ZW file is saved in the "ZooperWidget" folder in the SD card along with a .PNG screenshot of your widget. You can share the template by placing it in the "ZooperWidget" folder in the SD card of the recipient's device.
The free version of Zooper Widget cannot open the ZW file, only the Zooper Widget Pro can open the ZW file.
NOTE: Zooper Widget Pro has been discontinued and is no longer available for download.

description: Compressed .ZIP archive created and used by Zooper Widget Pro, an android app used to create custom Android widgets; stores a template with all the resources of the widget such as bitmaps and fonts.
